channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 16:05 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 16:05 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 15:55 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kryvyi Rih rayon- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 15:55 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kryvyi Rih rayon- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
